entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Monday 1 May 2023
